import React.description: Import only React from React module.

import React, {Component}.description: Import React and Component from React module.

all inclusive functional component.description: Creates a new stateless functional component; imports, definition, propTypes, and export.

all inclusive class component.description: Creates a component class; imports, definition, propTypes, and export.

just class Component.name: class component

constructor; props and context.description: Component constructor with props and context.

componentWillMount.description: Invoked once, both on the client and server, immediately before the initial rendering occurs

componentDidMount.description: Invoked once, only on the client (not on the server), immediately after the initial rendering occurs.

componentWillReceiveProps.description: Invoked when a component is receiving new props. This method is not called for the initial render.

shouldComponentUpdate.description: Invoked before rendering when new props or state are being received.

componentWillUpdate.description: Invoked immediately before rendering when new props or state are being received.

componentDidUpdate.description: Invoked immediately after the component's updates are flushed to the DOM.

componentWillUnmount.description: Invoked immediately before a component is unmounted from the DOM.

set state.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state.

set state w/ function.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state.

bind method to class.description: Binds the this of a method. To be used inside a constructor.

propType node.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array.

propType node required.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array required.

propType instanceOf.description: Is an instance of a class prop type.

propType instanceOf required.description: Is an instance of a class prop type required.

propType enum.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum.

propType enum required.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum required.

propType one of type.description: An object that could be one of many types.

propType one of type required.description: An object that could be one of many types required.

propType array of.description: An array of a certain type.

propType array of required.description: An array of a certain type required.

propType object of.description: An object with property values of a certain type.

propType object of required.description: An object with property values of a certain type required.

propType shape.description: An object taking on a particular shape.

propType shape required.description: An object taking on a particular shape required.
